text: JANUARY 2024 Digital Assets Quarterly Chart Pack

Power BI Desktop Digital Assets Update Q4 2023 Commentary • Major Index Performance:​ ​ • Trading Volume Increase:​ ​ • NFT Market Dynamics:​ ​ • Retail vs. Whole Activity: There was slight growth in the number of Bitcoin addresses with balances ≥ 0.1 and ≥ 1 BTC, indicating gradual retail accumulation. Meanwhile, addresses with balances ≥ 100 and ≥ 1k BTC began to rise suggesting that larger entities (whales) were also accumulating Bitcoin in Q4​​. • DeFi Sector Trends: The Total Value Locked (TVL) in DeFi remained highly concentrated on Ethereum, which dominated with 54%. Interest in the Solana chain rose significantly, resulting in a threefold increase in TVL​​. • Stablecoin Market: The stablecoin market cap experienced an increase, with USDT maintaining its dominance as the biggest stablecoin by market capitalization​​. • Top Cryptocurrency Shifts: Solana (SOL) jumped from 7th to 5th position by market capitalization, experiencing a 917.3% price increase in 2023. Meanwhile, cryptocurrencies like Hedera (HBAR), Binance USD (BUSD), Monero (XMR), and True USD (TUSD) dropped out of the top 30 cryptos by market capitalization​​. • Spot ETF Speculation: Speculation around the approval of Spot ETFs became a major market catalyst in Q4​​. • Emerging Sectors in DeFi:​​ Liquid staking, particularly in Ethereum and Solana, and the tokenization of real-world assets (RWA) gained significant traction in 2023. 1 All data as of Dec 31, 2023
